ch.iserver.ace.collaboration
Interface PublishedSession

All Superinterfaces:
Session
All Known Implementing Classes:
PublishedSessionImpl
public interface PublishedSession
extends Session

A PublishedSession extends a Session with methods that are only available to the owner (publisher) of the session itself.

PublishedSessions are obtained by calling publish on the CollaborationService instance.
